articles.content: Reported By:| Edited By: DNA Web Team |Source: DNA webdesk |Updated: May 17, 2023, 08:41 AM ISTWhatsApp has often been embroiled in controversy and accused of sharing users' data with Meta. WhatsApp,… [+4097 chars]

articles.title: Poco F5 goes on sale in India: Price, specs and more - Times of India
articles.description: Poco has released its latest smartphone, the F5, exclusively on Indian online retailer Flipkart. The device features a 6.67-inch Xfinity Pro AMOLED Di
articles.content: Poco F5 5G: First impressionsPoco F5 5G has a 64MP primary sensor that supports Optical Image Stabilisation (OIS). The smartphone packs up to 12GB RAM and up to 256GB storage and starts at Rs 29,999.… [+129 chars]
